meanings.definition: The quality of being full-bosomed or having a large bosom.
meanings.sent1: Her buxomness was evident in the elegant dress she wore.
meanings.sent2: The actress's buxomness was a defining feature of her beauty.
meanings.sent3: The buxomness of the mannequin made the tailor chuckle as he adjusted the outfit.
meanings.sent4: In the painting, the artist exaggerated the buxomness of the subject to make a bold statement.
meanings.sent5: The buxomness of the statue captured the attention of all who passed by.

meanings.definition: The state of being plump and attractive in a lively or healthy way.
meanings.sent1: The chef's secret to delicious dishes was the buxomness of his ingredients.
meanings.sent2: The children played happily in the park, their buxomness adding to their charm.
meanings.sent3: The buxomness of the puppy made everyone in the room smile.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, filled with the buxomness of joy.
meanings.sent5: The garden bloomed with the buxomness of colorful flowers.
